title: Skin complaints (again)
body: Soo ... Zoe is getting a skin?? Where's Auralion Sol's skin? Or a new Ivern Skin? Or a new Camille skin? But nope. Let's give a champ that's considerably the newest champ on released league (not counting pbe because Kai'Sa is playable on it) a skin. Fark the other champs tho right riot?

replies.body: Do you not read context or just take everything at face value?

They literally announced that Sol is getting a skin this year.

Zoes skin was just shown to announce the pool party event coming this year.

An Aurelion skin has already been confirmed for 2018. In the announcement video they were talking about new gamemodes while Pool Party Zoe was shown, so my guess is that there's going to be a pool party gamemode coming and the skins team thought Zoe would be a better fit than Camille or Ivern.
